meanings.sent1: The fishboats sailed out early in the morning to catch fresh fish.
meanings.sent2: We saw many fishboats lined up along the dock, ready to head out to sea.
meanings.sent3: The fishboats had a competition to see who could catch the biggest fish.

meanings.sent5: The colorful fishboats bobbed gently on the calm waters, a picturesque sight.

meanings.definition: The act of fishing from a boat.
meanings.sent1: Fishing from fishboats is a popular pastime for many people.
meanings.sent2: The fishboats returned to shore with their nets full of fish after a successful day of fishing.
meanings.sent3: The fishboats engaged in a friendly competition to see who could catch the most fish.

meanings.sent5: The fishboats rocked gently with the waves as the fishermen cast their lines into the sea.

meanings.definition: To go fishing on a boat.
meanings.sent1: We decided to fishboats on the lake for our weekend getaway.
